headline.main: AUCTION AT NAVY BALL; Queen's Birthday Book Will Be Sold at Party on Nov. 26

lead_paragraph: A feature of the Navy Ball to be given Nov. 26 in the Grand Ballroom of the Waldorf-Astoria by the Navy League of the United States and Bundles for Britain, will be the auctioning of the Queen's Birthday Book, a volume of portraits and autographs of royalty published in 1887 in London for the Golden Jubilee of Queen Victoria.
abstract: Donates Queen's Birthday Book to be auctioned at Bundles for Brit benefit Navy Ball

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: NAVY LEAGUE OF THE U S
